member.name: T:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.EthosClient
member.summary: Service that provides methos that can send requests to the Ethos API

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.EthosClient.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.Logger)
member.summary: Class constructor that accepts the application configuration and the logger object through dependency injection

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.EthosClient.GetAuthTokenAsync
member.summary: Retrieves an auth token from the Ethos API via a POST request to Auth The auth token will be cached, and if it is needed again, it will be returned from the cache. If the cached token expires, a new token will be retrieved.
member.returns: A JWT used for the authorization header of subsequent requests

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.EthosClient.GetRoomsAsync
member.summary: Gets a List of Room objects via a GET request to the Ethos API
member.returns: A List of Room objects populated with the data retrieved from the Ethos API

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.EthosClient.GetRoomsAsync(OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Models.Building)
member.summary: Gets a List of Room objects via a GET request to the Ethos API filtered by building.
member.param: The building to filter the rooms request by
member.returns: A List of Room objects associated with the provided building

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.EthosClient.GetRoomsAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a filtered List of Room objects via a GET request to the EThos API filtered by the supplied criteria string
member.param: a stringified JSON object containing the parameters to filter by

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.EthosClient.EthosGetByIDArrayAsStringAsync``1(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Gets a List of Room objects via a GET request to the Ethos API for each ID in the provided array
member.param: Resource name to query
Array of ids as strings
member.returns: A json string of T Objects populated with the retrieved data.

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.EthosClient.EthosGetByIDArrayAsync``1(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Retrieves a List of T objects from the Ethos API for each ID in the provided array
member.typeparam: The Type of objects to return
member.param: The resource to query
The array of IDs to retrieve
member.returns: A List of T Objects populated with the data retrieved.

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.EthosClient.SendRoomRequest(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a GET request to the Ethos API for Room objects filtered by the supplied criteria string
member.param: A JSON string containing the parameters to filter by
member.returns: A List of Room objects populated with the retrieved data.

member.summary: Retrieves an object from the Ethos API by ID as a string

The ID to retrieve
Optional accept header to send to the API
member.returns: A JSON string containing the requested data

member.summary: Retrieves an object of type T from the Ethos API
member.param: The resource to query
The ID to retrieve
Optional accept header to send with the request
member.returns: An Object of type T containing the data retrieved

A JSON string containing the parameters to filter the request by
The maximum number of records to return
The record offset to request
The accept header to send with the request
The content-type header to send with the request

member.summary: Requests all records from the Ethos API for a given resource and returns them as a List of T objects

member.param: Resource to query

Accept header to send with the request

member.summary: Returns the supervisor(s) of the provided person.

Include inactive supervisory relationships

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.EthosClient.EthosGetSupervisorsAsync(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Using an ERP ID, retrieve an employee's supervisor record from the Ethos API
member.param: The Colleague Person ID of the person who's supervisor data you need.
If true, the method will also return previous supervisors
member.returns: A List of Person objects representing the user's supervisors

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.EthosClient.EthosGetAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This is the base Get Request method for the library. All other methods that perform a GET request eventually call this method. This method will return an HttpResponseMessage object that contains the response message from the Ethos API.
member.param: The Ethos API Resource to which you are sending a request
A JSON object (stringified) that represents the filter criteria for the request
The max page limit to return from the API (if the Ethos API imposes a limit, it will override this parameter if exceeded.
The record offset to send with the request
The Accept header to send with the request
The Content-Type header to send with the request
member.returns: An HttpResponseMessage object containing the response from the Ethos API

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.EthosClient.EthosGetActiveAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This is the base Get Request method for the library. All other methods that perform a GET request eventually call this method. This method will return an HttpResponseMessage object that contains the response message from the Ethos API.
member.param: The Ethos API Resource to which you are sending a request
A JSON object (stringified) that represents the filter criteria for the request
The max page limit to return from the API (if the Ethos API imposes a limit, it will override this parameter if exceeded.
The record offset to send with the request
The Accept header to send with the request
The Content-Type header to send with the request
member.returns: An HttpResponseMessage object containing the response from the Ethos API

members.member: Retrieves a Person record based on a Colleague Person ID Et The Colleague Person ID to retrieve A Person Object representing the retrieved Person

member.summary: Sent a POST request to a resource of the Ethos API

The payload to send to the resource
The Accept Header to send with the request
The Content-Type Header to send with the request.

member.name: T:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Models.AcademicPeriodComparer
member.summary: Compares two AcademicPeriod objects for equality based on their code property.
member.remarks: This class implements the IEqualityComparer interface to provide custom equality comparison logic for AcademicPeriod objects. It is used to ensure that AcademicPeriod objects with the same code are considered equal.

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Models.AcademicPeriodComparer.Equals(OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Models.AcademicPeriod,OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Models.AcademicPeriod)
member.summary: Compares two AcademicPeriod objects for equality based on their code property.
member.param: The first AcademicPeriod object to compare.
The second AcademicPeriod object to compare.
member.returns: True if the AcademicPeriod objects are equal; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Models.AcademicPeriodComparer.GetHashCode(OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Models.AcademicPeriod)
member.summary: Returns a hash code for the specified AcademicPeriod object.
member.param: The AcademicPeriod object for which to generate a hash code.
member.returns: A hash code for the specified AcademicPeriod object.
member.remarks: This method is used to generate a hash code for the AcademicPeriod object based on its code property. It is used in conjunction with the Equals method to ensure that AcademicPeriod objects with the same code have the same hash code.

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.EmployeeService.#ctor(OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.EthosClient,OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.Logger)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The Ethos client used for API interactions.
The logger used for logging information.
member.remarks: This class is responsible for retrieving employee and contract type data from the Ethos API. It uses the EthosClient to make API calls and fetch data.

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.EmployeeService.GetAllEmployeesAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves all employees from the Ethos API with an optional limit.
member.param: The maximum number of employees to retrieve (default is 10).

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.EmployeeService.GetActiveEmployeesAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves active employees from the Ethos API.
member.param: The maximum number of active employees to retrieve (default is 10) if the getAllEmployees param is false. Otherwise, it is the max page size.
If true, retrieves all active employees without limit.
member.remarks: This method retrieves active employees based on the status field in the Ethos API. The default behavior is to limit the number of employees retrieved to 10. If getAllEmployees is set to true, it retrieves all active employees without limit and the limit parameter is used as the max page size. This is useful for paginated requests where you want to retrieve all active employees in a single call.
member.returns: A list of active Employee objects.

member.summary: Retrieves all contract types from the Ethos API.

member.returns: A list of contract type objects.

member.name: T:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.Logger
member.summary: Logger class for logging messages to a file in JSON format. This class provides methods to log error messages, simple strings, and other log entries. It uses a specified directory for storing log files and supports different log entry types.

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.Logger.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The configuration object used to retrieve settings.
member.remarks: This constructor initializes the logger with the specified configuration. It resolves the log directory path and ensures that the directory exists.
member.example: // Example usage: var logger = new Logger(configuration);

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.Logger.LogError(OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Models.ErrorMessage)
member.summary: Logs an error message to the log file.
member.param: The error message to log.
member.remarks: This method serializes the error message into JSON format and writes it to the log file. It uses the default log entry type (Error) to categorize the log entry.
member.example: // Example usage: logger.LogError(new ErrorMessage { Message = "An error occurred." });

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.Logger.LogError(OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Models.ErrorMessage,OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.LogEntryType)
member.summary: Logs an error message to the log file.
member.param: The error message to log.
The type of log entry (e.g., Info, Warning, Error, Debug).
member.remarks: This method serializes the error message into JSON format and writes it to the log file. It uses the specified log entry type to determine how to categorize the log entry.
member.example: // Example usage: logger.LogError(new ErrorMessage { Message = "An error occurred." }, LogEntryType.Error);

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.Logger.LogString(System.String,OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.LogEntryType)
member.summary: Logs a simple string message to the log file.
member.param: The message to log.
The type of log entry (e.g., Info, Warning, Error, Debug).
member.remarks: This method serializes the message into JSON format and writes it to the log file. It uses the specified log entry type to determine how to categorize the log entry.

member.name: T:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.LogEntry
member.summary: Base class for Log Entries

member.name: P:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.LogEntry.Timestamp
member.summary: The timestamp of the log entry. This property is used to store the date and time when the log entry was created.

member.name: P:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.LogEntry.Type
member.summary: The type of the log entry. This property is used to store the type of log entry (e.g., Info, Warning, Error, Debug).

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.LogEntry.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor for the LogEntry class. Initializes a new instance of the LogEntry class with the current timestamp and an empty type.

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.LogEntry.#ctor(OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.LogEntryType)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the LogEntry class with the specified type.
member.param: The type of the log entry.
member.remarks: This constructor is used to create a log entry with a specific type. It sets the Timestamp property to the current date and time.
member.example: // Example usage: var logEntry = new LogEntry(LogEntryType.Info);

member.name: T:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.ErrorLogEntry
member.summary: Derived class used to log ErrorMessage objects

member.name: P:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.ErrorLogEntry.Body
member.summary: The body of the log entry. This property is used to store the ErrorMessage object associated with the log entry.
member.remarks: This property is used to store the ErrorMessage object associated with the log entry. It contains details about the error that occurred.
member.example: // Example usage: var errorLogEntry = new ErrorLogEntry(new ErrorMessage { Message = "An error occurred." });

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.ErrorLogEntry.#ctor(OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Models.ErrorMessage)
member.summary: Default constructor for the ErrorLogEntry class. Initializes a new instance of the ErrorLogEntry class with an empty body.

member.name: T:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.StringLogEntry
member.summary: Derived class used to add simple strings to the log.

member.name: P:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.StringLogEntry.Body
member.summary: The body of the log entry. This property is used to store the message or content of the log entry.

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.StringLogEntry.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor for the StringLogEntry class. Initializes a new instance of the StringLogEntry class with an empty body.
member.remarks: This constructor is used to create a log entry without any specific message. It sets the Body property to an empty string.

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.StringLogEntry.#ctor(System.String,OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.LogEntryType)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified body and type.

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Services.StudentAcademicProgramService.GetStudentHomeCampusFromPrograms(System.Collections.Generic.List{OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Models.StudentAcademicProgram},System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Gets the home campus code from student academic programs
member.remarks: This is a best attempt at replicating the functionality of the legacy subroutine S.GET.STU.HOME.LOCATION. Without visibility into the exact implementation of that subroutine, this method uses the site/campus information from the student's academic programs as a reasonable approximation. The legacy process may have used additional institution-specific logic that is not replicated here.
member.param: List of the student's academic programs
Dictionary mapping site IDs to campus codes
member.returns: The student's home campus code or empty string if not found

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Utilities.StringUtilities.SafeSubstring(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Safely retrieves a substring from a string, ensuring no exceptions are thrown.
member.param: The input string.
The starting index of the substring.
The length of the substring.
member.returns: The substring, or an empty string if the operation fails.

member.name: M:OaklandCC.Ethos.Common.Utilities.StringUtilities.EscapeCsvField(System.String)
member.summary: Escapes a field for CSV output by wrapping it in quotes and doubling any internal quotes.
member.param: The field to escape.
member.remarks: This method checks if the field contains a comma, quote, or newline. If it does, it wraps the field in quotes and doubles any internal quotes. If the field is null or empty, it returns an empty string.
member.exception: Thrown if the field is null.
Thrown if the field is empty.

example.code: string escapedField = StringUtilities.EscapeCsvField("Hello, \"World\""); // escapedField will be "Hello, ""World"""
